fields.description: the resource from which the rule collects its data. For this type dataSource will always be of type RuleMetricDataSource.
fields.name: DataSource

fields.description: specifies the type of condition. This can be one of three types: ManagementEventRuleCondition (occurrences of management events), LocationThresholdRuleCondition (based on the number of failures of a web test), and ThresholdRuleCondition (based on the threshold of a metric).
fields.name: OdataType
